sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPARMANNIA, in botany; a genus of plants belonging to the claſs of polyandria, and to the order of m onogynia. The corolla conſiſts of four petals, and is bent back; the nectaria are numerous, and ſwell a little ; the calyx is quadriphyllous ; the capſule is angulated, quinquelocular and echinated. There is only one ſpecies, the Africana.
